articles.title: $25B-valued Chime files for an IPO, reveals $33M deal with Dallas Mavericks - TechCrunch
articles.description: At long last, digital consumer bank Chime has moved forward with its IPO by filing its S-1 paperwork Tuesday. Chime had reportedly filed confidential S-1
articles.content:
At long last, digital consumer bank Chime has moved forward with its IPO by filing its S-1 paperwork Tuesday. Chime had reportedly filed confidential S-1 paperwork back in December.

articles.title: Trump administration's universal flu vaccine project puzzles scientists - NPR
articles.description: The Trump administration has launched a $500 million project to develop a universal flu vaccine that won't need yearly updates. But vaccine experts are mystified by its focus on a dated technology.
articles.content:
Vaccine experts are perplexed by a project the Trump administration has launched to develop a universal flu vaccine, which has long been a goal, though an elusive one, in medical research.

articles.title: TikTok launches TikTok AI Alive, a new image-to-video tool - TechCrunch
articles.description: TikTok is launching its first image-to-video AI feature called TikTok AI Alive.
articles.content: TikTok is launching its first image-to-video AI feature, the company announced on Tuesday. The new feature is called “TikTok AI Alive” and allows users to turn static photos into videos within TikTok… [+2137 chars]
